posts.title: 基础公式
posts.slug: Math Exercise Set/基础公式/基础公式
posts.path: 2023/03/04/Math Exercise Set/基础公式/基础公式/
posts.text: 三角函数基本转换(注意F(x)) \[ 奇变偶不变,符号看相限,默认 0< \alpha<\frac{\pi}{2} \\ \sin(\frac{\pi}{2}+\alpha) = \cos\alpha, \sin(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha) = \cos\alpha \\ \cos(\frac{\pi}{2}+\alpha) = -\sin\alpha, \cos(\frac{\pi}{2}-\alpha) = \sin\alpha \\ \cos(\pi+\alpha) = -\cos\alpha, \sin(\pi-\alpha) = \sin\alpha \\ \cos(\pi+\alpha) = -\cos\alpha, \cos(\pi-\alpha) = -\cos\alpha \\ ---\\ ---\\ \sin(\alpha \pm \beta) = \sin\alpha\cos\beta \pm \sin\beta \cos\alpha\\ \cos(\alpha \pm \beta) = \cos\alpha\cos\beta \mp\sin\alpha\sin\beta\\ \tan(\alpha\pm\beta) = \frac{\tan\alpha\pm\tan\beta}{1\mp\tan\alpha\tan\beta}\\ \cot(\alpha\pm\beta) = \frac{\cot\alpha\cot\beta\mp + 1}{\cot\beta\pm\cot\alpha}\\ \sin 2\alpha = 2\sin\alpha\cos\alpha\\\cos2\alpha = \cos^2\alpha-\sin^2\alpha=1-2\sin^2\alpha=2\cos^2\alpha-1\\ \sin^3\alpha= -4\sin^3\alpha+3\sin\alpha,\cos^3\alpha=4\cos^3\alpha-3\cos\alpha\\ \tan 2\alpha=\frac{2\tan\alpha}{1-\tan^2\alpha},\cot 2^\alpha=\frac{\cot^2\alpha - 1}{2\cot\alpha}\\ \] 三角函数求导公式 + 求导常用公式(注意F(x)) \[ y=\sin x \quad y' = \cos x;\quad y=\cos x \quad y'= -\sin x;\\ y=\tan x \quad y' =\sec^2x;\quad y = \cot x \quad y'= -\csc^2x;\\ y= \sec x \quad y'=\sec x \tan x;\quad y = \csc x\quad y'=-\csc x\cot x;\\y = \arcsin x \quad y' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}; \quad y = \arccos x \quad y' = -\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}};\\ y = \arctan x \quad y' = \frac{1}{1+x^2};\quad y = arccot \ x = -\frac{1}{1+x^2};\\ (x^a)'= ax^{a-1},\quad (a^x)'=a^x\ln a,\quad (\log _a x)'=\frac{1}{x\ln a}\\ (\ln |x|)' = \frac{1}{x}\\ [\ln (x + \sqrt{x^2 + 1})]' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 + 1}},\quad [\ln (x + \sqrt{x^2 - 1})]' = \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 - 1}} \]

posts.title: 例题6.3
posts.slug: Math Exercise Set/中值定理/例题6.3
posts.text: \[ 设f(x)在[0,1]上具有一阶连续导数,f(0) = 0,证明:存在\xi \in [0,1] \\ 使得f'(\xi)=2\int_0^2f(x)dx \] 思路： （1）题干里面有一阶连续导数，让我们证明的有是导数=F(x),因此我们就可以从一阶导数入手 （2）积分是一个常数值，我们又看到自变量的取值范围+ 连续 我们就想到可以用介值定理，假设f'(x)的范围在m到M之间，我们只需证明出积分的范围也在m到M之间即可 （3）我们用拉格朗日中值定理将f'(x)与f(x)联系在一起，然后再用f(x)与积分联系在一起 求解过程（最值定理+介值定理+拉格朗日中值定理） image-20230304131350892 另一个求解过程（积分中值定理+拉格朗日中值定理） image-20230304133150447

posts.title: DESCRIBE A PLACE YOU ENJOY
posts.slug: English Composition Exercise/March/DESCRIBE A PLACE  ENJOY
posts.text: Write a paragraph describing your favorite place to visit. It could be a city, a park, a beach, or any other location that you love. Describe what you like about it and why you enjoy going there. One of my favorite places to visit is a quiet and peaceful beach located near my hometown. Whenever I go there, I feel a sense of relaxation that helps me escape from the stresses of everyday life. The natural scenery is absolutely breathtaking, with crystal-clear waters and soft white sand. The sound of waves crashing against the shore and the gentle breeze blowing through my hair create a calming atmosphere that makes me feel at ease. I also love the fact that the beach is not overcrowded, which allows me to enjoy the tranquility and serenity of the place. Overall, it's the perfect destination for me to unwind and recharge my batteries. NOTES tranquility: Tranquility means a state of calmness and peacefulness, free from disturbance or turmoil. It's often used to describe a place or situation that is serene and quiet, and where one can relax and unwind. For example, someone might describe a peaceful beach or a quiet forest as having a sense of tranquility. breathtaking: Breathtaking means that something is so impressive or beautiful that it literally takes your breath away or makes you feel as though you are unable to breathe for a moment. It's often used to describe natural landscapes or scenery that are incredibly stunning and awe-inspiring. For example, a breathtaking view from a mountaintop or a breathtaking sunset over the ocean. as though: "As though" is a conjunction that is used to make a comparison between two things or situations that may not actually be true. It is similar in meaning to "as if". For example, "She acted as though she didn't know me" means that she behaved in a way that suggested she didn't know me, even though she might have actually known me. It's often used to express hypothetical or imaginary situations. Tip The above essay have been modified from CHATGPT which is very helpful for my English. At the end, I want to say thank you for its help. And let it modify what I'm saying. My Exact Words: Thank you so much. I have learned lots of knowledge from you at this time. If possible, could you help me make my words up there more coherent and smooth. Its Modification: Thank you so much for all your help. I've learned a lot from you during our conversation today. This is a slight rephrasing that uses a more conversational tone and includes a reference to our conversation, which makes the sentence more specific and personal. 😀😀😀 It's a wonderful modification!!!!!!

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 😊😊😊🔥 Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
